game_description: 1.09 Update - 07/08/21 Welcome to Solaris Offworld Combat--a fast-paced, multiplayer shooter that drops you straight into intense action. Suit up, log in & game on--you’re about to jump into 4v4 match-ups, where you’ll run, sprint & slide your way across arenas, picking up weapons & items to eliminate your opponents. Coordinate with your team to defeat your rivals & take over the Control Point to win the match! Includes: - 7 Maps - Varieties of Weapons - An Assortment of Utilities - Multiple Cosmetics to personalize your Athlon! - Squad Functionality - VOIP - 50 Levels of player Progression - Daily XP bonus - Weekly Challenges
Languages: English, English (US), French (France), German, Japanese, Korean, Spanish (Mexico)
review_1: For me, Solaris is not just a game; it is like my second home, where I live and transport between my Earthly abode. Many of the apps I use are like one of the fun activities that I engage in when I go out from my Solaris home on weekends. Solaris also has a great and unique community. GoldenEagle
review_2: Solaris won’t launch. What’s the issue?!!
review_3: You can never connect. Has major issues. I never even got to play a single game. Save your money.
review_4: It’s just a flatscreen game taped to your face, it wasn’t very fun when it was active and now you can’t even find a server, save your money and just skip this one
review_5: I got the game about a week ago and i regret it. The concept is great but i never actually get put into a game. I got into one game but it never started because there was only 2 people in the lobby. I walked around and got myself familiar with the guns and arena for a solid 40 minutes without the game ever starting. Now every time I go on my headset i try to get into a match. I sit there for 10 minutes and don't get into a match. If they fix this it is worth buying. But please don't waste your money on a game that doesn't work. Please.
